select * from free_board where delete_yn = 'N' order by create_at desc limit 8;

select fb.id as id, fb.title as title, fb.content as content, fb.u_id as uId, fb.file as file, fb.create_at as createAt, fb.update_at as updateAt, fb.delete_at as deleteAt, fb.main_category as mainCategory, fb.sub_category as subCategory, v.view as view , count(fr.free_board_id) as goodCount from free_board as fb left join free_board_recommendation fr on fb.id = fr.free_board_id and fr.good_yn = 'Y' left join free_board_view v on fb.id = v.free_board_id where fb.delete_yn = 'N' group by fb.id order by goodCount desc;

select fb.id as id, fb.title as title, fb.content as content, fb.u_id as uId, fb.file as file, fb.create_at as createAt, fb.update_at as updateAt, fb.delete_at as deleteAt, fb.main_category as mainCategory, fb.sub_category as subCategory, count(fr.free_board_id) as goodCount , u.name as userName , u.file as userFile from free_board as fb left join free_board_recommendation fr on fb.id = fr.free_board_id and fr.good_yn = 'Y' left join user u on u.u_id = fb.u_id where fb.delete_yn = 'N' and fb.id = #{id} group by fb.id order by goodCount desc

SELECT fb.id AS id, fb.title AS title, fb.content AS content, fb.u_id AS userId, fb.file AS file, fb.create_at AS createAt, fb.update_at AS updateAt, fb.delete_at AS deleteAt, fb.delete_yn as deleteYn , main_cat.id AS mainCategoryId, sub_cat.id AS subCategoryId, main_cat.name as mainCategoryName , sub_cat.name as subCategoryName , ifnull(COUNT(fr.free_board_id), 0) AS goodCount , v.view as view FROM free_board AS fb LEFT JOIN free_board_recommendation AS fr ON fb.id = fr.free_board_id AND fr.good_yn = 'Y' INNER JOIN board_sub_category AS sub_cat ON fb.sub_category = sub_cat.id INNER JOIN board_main_category AS main_cat ON sub_cat.group_id = main_cat.id left join free_board_view v on fb.id = v.free_board_id WHERE fb.delete_yn = 'N' AND main_cat.id = #{mainCategoryId} AND sub_cat.id = #{subCategoryId} GROUP BY fb.id ORDER BY goodCount DESC

SELECT main_cat.id AS mainCategoryId, sub_cat.id AS subCategoryId, sub_cat.name as subCategoryName FROM board_main_category AS main_cat INNER JOIN board_sub_category AS sub_cat ON main_cat.id = sub_cat.group_id LEFT JOIN free_board AS fb ON sub_cat.id = fb.sub_category AND main_cat.id = fb.main_category AND fb.delete_yn = 'N' GROUP BY main_cat.id, sub_cat.id ORDER BY COUNT(fb.id) DESC LIMIT 3

select f.id as id , f.title as title , f.content as content , f.u_id as userId , f.file as file , f.create_at as createAt , f.update_at as updateAt , f.delete_at as deleteAt , f.delete_yn as deleteYn , f.main_category as mainCategoryId , m.name as mainCategoryName , f.sub_category as subCategoryId , s.name as subCategoryName , ifnull(count(r.good_yn) , 0) as goodCount , ifnull(v.view , 0) as viewCount from free_board f inner join board_main_category m on f.main_category = m.id inner join board_sub_category s on f.sub_category = s.id left join free_board_recommendation r on r.free_board_id = f.id and r.good_yn = 'Y' left join free_board_view v on v.free_board_id = f.id where f.delete_yn = 'N'
and (f.main_category = #{mainCategory} and f.sub_category = #{subCategory})
group by f.id order by f.id desc limit #{start} , 10
